title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Looking for premium hand protection during your welding or cutting torch work? Look no further than the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641! These gloves offer heavy-duty protection with heat, flame, and chemical resistance. The fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction ensure durability, while the winged thumb design provides flexibility. 

Made from split cowhide grade A leather with a cotton fleece interior, these gloves are not only protective but also comfortable to wear. The gauntlet cuff style with a 13.5-inch length provides extra coverage. Suitable for MIG welding and stick welding applications, these gloves are a must-have for any welder.

Get your hands on these top-quality gloves in a stylish gray color. Perfect for both men and women, these one-size-fits-most gloves are the ultimate choice for your welding needs. Don't compromise on safety - choose the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 for unbeatable protection.

With fully welted seams, lock-stitch construction, and a gauntlet cuff design, these gloves are durable and built to last. The winged thumb design and Kevlar stitching material ensure flexibility and strength. Available in a stylish gray color, these gloves are unisex and come in one size that fits most.
